name: Katie Holmes
description: American actress and producer known for her role in 'Dawson's Creek' and 'Batman Begins'.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Katie Holmes is an American actress and producer, born in 1978 in Toledo, Ohio. She rose to fame after starring as Joey Potter on the television series *Dawson's Creek* from 1998 to 2003.

content.title: Career
content.body: Holmes began her acting career with a small role in *The Ice Storm* (1997). She gained significant recognition with her role in *Dawson's Creek*. Her notable film works include *Batman Begins* (2005) and *Thank You for Smoking* (2006). Holmes is known for her versatile acting style, which has allowed her to play a variety of roles in both television and film.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Holmes worked with director Christopher Nolan in the film *Batman Begins*. She also collaborated with Aaron Eckhart in *Thank You for Smoking*.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Katie Holmes is recognized as one of the prominent actresses of her generation, having moved from television to a successful film career. She has been nominated for several awards throughout her career and continues to influence young actors entering the industry.
